mapper.select: SELECT b.OBJ_ID,b.MKT_CAMPAIGN_ID,e.EVENT_ID,e.EVENT_NAME,e.EVENT_NBR FROM (SELECT a.MKT_CAMPAIGN_ID,a.OBJ_ID FROM obj_mkt_campaign_rel a WHERE a.OBJ_ID = (SELECT offer.OFFER_ID FROM `offer` WHERE offer_nbr = #{offerNbr,jdbcType = VARCHAR}) ) b LEFT JOIN (SELECT c.MKT_CAMPAIGN_ID, c.EVENT_ID,d.EVENT_NAME,d.EVENT_NBR FROM mkt_cam_evt_rel c,event d WHERE c.EVENT_ID= d.EVENT_ID AND d.EVT_TYPE_ID= #{eventType,jdbcType = BIGINT}) e ON b.MKT_CAMPAIGN_ID = e.MKT_CAMPAIGN_ID ORDER BY b.OBJ_ID,b.MKT_CAMPAIGN_ID;
